Amruta Incâ€™s application, Self-Learning System for e-Discovery, Among Large Text Corpus Data Sets to Improve Compliance, Forensics, and Customer Service, Using Machine Learning, has been selected for funding through the FY2019 solicitation of the Commonwealth Research Commercialization Fund (CRCF).
